subtasks: Approach the planter
Open the seed box door
Remove seed from storage
Fill seed box with desired crop seeds
Close the seed box after filling
Adjust planter speed or set travel time
Align the planter with the previous row
Lower the seeding mechanism to soil level
Engage the power take-off (PTO) to operate the planter
Start the planter operation
Monitor the planter's operation and make adjustments as needed

tasks.task: Drive the tractor pulling the planter
subtasks: Sit in the tractor seat
Engage the transmission to move the tractor
Navigate the tractor along the desired planting rows
Keep the tractor speed consistent
Use foot pedals to control the tractor’s movement and speed
Use the steering wheel or handles to maintain course
Shift gears as necessary to maintain optimal speed for planting
Walk behind the planter to check seed placement
Examine the spaced rows for proper seed depth and spacing
Check the note tag for germination rates or other data
Note any issues such as skips or overlaps in the rows
Address any immediate issues found during the check
Store note tag or collect data for record-keeping
Ensure all equipment is secure and ready for next use
